desc: Salon Elemis located in Toms River, NJ is a full service salon for men, women and children. We offer the latest trends in hair color from highlights to ombre and balayage. We also specialize in elegant updo’s for a prom or wedding and offer bridal packages for the entire bridal party. A classic manicure, gel manicure.

layout.text: Since opening its doors in March 2006, our salon has been at full force establishing a reputation of mastery in hair cutting, styling, and coloring.
